name: WPP plc
description: WPP plc is a British multinational communications, advertising, public relations, and technology company. Founded in 1985, WPP has grown to become one of the world's largest advertising and marketing services groups, operating in more than 100 countries. The company provides a comprehensive range of services, including advertising, media planning and buying, digital marketing, public relations, branding, and market research. WPP works with many of the world's leading brands, helping them to build strong connections with their customers and drive business growth. The company is known for its innovative approach to marketing and its ability to leverage data analytics and technology to create effective campaigns. WPP has embraced the shift towards digital and is committed to integrating technology into its services to meet the evolving needs of clients in an increasingly digital world. With a diverse portfolio of agencies and partners, WPP is dedicated to delivering integrated solutions that help clients navigate complex market dynamics and achieve their business objectives.

seo.meta_title: WPP plc | Global Leader in Advertising and Marketing Services
seo.meta_description: WPP plc is a leading global communications, advertising, and marketing services company, providing innovative solutions and comprehensive services to brands worldwide.

faq.question: What services does WPP provide?
faq.answer: WPP provides a wide range of services including advertising, media planning and buying, digital marketing, public relations, and branding.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of WPP?
faq.answer: Mark Read is the CEO of WPP plc.

faq.question: Where is WPP headquartered?
faq.answer: WPP is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.
